song.title: Android Girl
song.info:
2nd in the streamed music compo @ tUM 2008.
[i]Lyrics: Android Girl! When she got into my life I felt like heaven just came down to me [???] perfect shape Her lips are prob'ly sweet as exctasy
She has [???] for every fantasy Takes me to the stars above
And when I'm fed up with her turning me on I flip that little switch and turn her off
Android Girl Never complains Never [???] Android Girl Is just for me Obeys my will
Some people think that I am weird That living with a robot's somehow sad Yet when they eat the food she makes They all go like, "Best meal I've ever had" Mmmm. Yum
I'm leading all the girls around The ones who never looked at me before They all are craving makeout tips [???] crying on my door[/i]
